name: Space - The Return Of The Pixxelfrazzer
description: Space - The Return Of The Pixxelfrazzer is an open-world sci-fi hack'n'slash. Your aim is to explore the inexhaustible amounts of destructible asteroid fields, spacestations and unknown planets of the universe. And maybe, one day you'll probably find out about one of the most unsolved mystery of our universe... the pixxelfrazzer.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 20 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: XP or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 20 MB available space
